results.description: With numerous failures to replicate, common misreporting of results, widespread failure to publish non- significant results or to share data, and considerable potential bias due the flexibility of analyses of data and researcher’s tendency to exploit that flexibility, psychological science is said to experience a crisis of confidence. The goal of this postdoc project is to counter the biasing effects of common explorations of data (p-hacking) by developing new statistical and machine-learning a…
results.title: Postdoc in statistics/machine learning (4 years, full-time)

results.description: The laboratory for experimental oncology at the AMC is looking for a PhD candidate with a quantitative background (e.g. physics or mathematics) to decipher how cancers develop resistance to drug therapy. The PhD candidate will design stochastic models of tumor growth, and apply them directly to experimental data to elucidate the mode of tumor growth and the resulting resistance to drug therapy. Working in close collaboration with biomedical researchers, the PhD candidate will develop quantitati…
results.title: Quantitative approaches to cancer evolution (PhD)
Universitair docent Strafrecht
results.description: De Faculteit der Rechtsgeleerdheid heeft een vacature voor een Universitair docent Strafrecht. De universitair docent gaat onderwijs geven, coördineren en ontwikkelen binnen de afdeling Strafrecht en dient binnen dat domein breed inzetbaar te zijn (en zowel bachelor- als mastervakken te verzorgen). Van de medewerker wordt verwacht dat hij/zij kwalitatief hoogwaardig en relevant onderzoek verricht op het terrein van het Strafrecht.

The interest in “just in time” maintenance is growing and the need is being understood by more and more industrial sectors. Degradation of systems and machineries is a dynamic process, governed by changes in the system and its functionality, its environment, the process, and the users. “Just in time maintenance” requires a thorough understanding of all processes and factors affecting the system and the process. This becomes a difficult, if not impossible, process without availability of data. D…

results.description: Research at the Merln Institute for Technology-inspired Regenerative Medicine is focused on developing novel and challenging technologies to advance the field of tissue and organ repair and regeneration. The research program of cBITE is characterized by a holistic approach to both discovery and application, aiming at combining high thro…

results.description: U gaat werken voor het departement Medische en Klinische Psychologie. De functie betreft het geven van (klinisch) onderwijs in de Nederlands en Engelstalige Bachelor Psychologie. results.description: High-precision manufacturing pushes the limits of what is possible with conventional manufacturing systems. The development of the new generation of high-precision manufacturing systems relies on detailed understanding of the process disturbances which cause variation in the end-product. This project aims at developing models for control of manufacturing processes which can be used for interpreting small variations in the process due to product-to-product disturbances. Such accurate and mature …
results.title: PhD position: Integrating models and real-time data for zero-defect manufacturing control systems

results.description: Aan de Afdeling Sociologie en de Amsterdam Institute for Social Science Research (AISSR) van de Universiteit van Amsterdam zijn er vier vacatures voor promovendi binnen het Groupviolence Onderzoeksprogramma (ERC Consolidator Grant). results.description: BMC Moerdijk is –sinds de oprichting in 2008– de énige energiecentrale op het Europese vasteland, die pluimveemest omzet in groene stroom. Wij staan voor duurzame oplossingen en daarom maken we hergebruik van kostbare mineralen mogelijk. results.description: Kraamzorg de Waarden levert professionele kraamzorg in een groot deel van Nederland en is met 14.000 verzorgingen en ruim 950 medewerkers een van de grootste kraamzorgleveranciers. Onze missie is het bieden van zorg en diensten om onze cliënten en hun gezin zorgeloos te laten genieten tijdens en rond de kraamtijd.
